Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! It's UpsilonAerospace.

I've been inspired by HOCGaming's Kerbal Polar Expedition. I'm too poor to actually donate money, but hopefully, this makes up for it.

After a little while (<2hr) of making art, I've drawn a simple little picture of HOC on the surface of Duna, pointing the way to the North Pole (and to the KPE3 that I drew on this thing as well). There's really not much more to say about this drawing. Personally, I like it a lot.

Here's the drawing, in all of its glory:

~~~

So, I'm here to ask two things. The first: Do you like this drawing (and is there anything that needs to be changed)? The second: Is there any way to get HOC to see it? The normal way to bump something his way is through donations, but as I said earlier, I don't currently have a way of doing that...

Anyway, thanks for stopping by!

-Upsilon
Pretty nice, you should show this to HOCgaming.

Pretty nice, you should show this to HOCgaming.

Thanks!

Once again, though, I really don't have any way of doing that right now. (I would have posted it in chat, but unfortunately I had college classes yesterday. I'm thinking that the best way to do this may just be to post this in the chat when I get the chance and just hope that as many people as possible see it.) I may also ask somebody to donate money on my behalf and leave the link in the comments.

...I hope my work gets noticed by the people it was inspired by!

-Upsilon

Can't see it at school but I'm sure its great.

EDIT: home now, saw it, it's beautiful!!!!

Edited August 22, 2015 by Endersmens
